description: Noin is a good friend of Zechs from his days at the Lake Victoria military academy. After graduation, she joined the academy`s staff, and now trains new Specials recruits in the art of space combat. Though Noin is a formidable mobile suit pilot, she doesn`t much care for fighting, and she often uses her influence with Oz`s leader to try to resolve crisis situations peacefully.
name: Lucrezia Noin
